channels.name: PRAIZY™ Radio
channels.description:
Welcome to PRAIZY™ Radio — The Official Soundtrack of a Faith-Fueled Generation

This ain’t your grandma’s faith-based music station. PRAIZY™ Radio is the home of Christian Pop Music, streaming 24/7 with nothing but bops, bangers, and original podcasts just for you. From Christian Pop to Pop Rock, Hip-Hop to Dance, R&B to Rhythmic Worship—we’re curating the new wave of faith-driven music that slaps. No fluff. No filler. Just fire, with Jesus at the center.
We’re the first and only station repping the Christian Pop format for Gen Z and younger millennials—a whole new lane for a new kind of believer and seeker. This is music that serves on an identity level. Think: Jesus meets TRL vibes, meets Hot 100 energy—with purpose.

Whether you’re vibin’ in the car, grinding at the gym, on your knees in worship, praising out with friends, in your prayer closet, or just need a little faith-fueled mood lift between classes—this is the space that gets you and meets you right where you are: socially engaged and in the center of everything.

Powered by PRAIZY™ Radio, the revolutionary Christian music + entertainment OTT startup, we’re not just playing music—we’re flipping the whole script. Your faith walk isn’t boring. It’s not chained to Sundays or giving the elder vibes streaming on KLOVE, Air1, or JoyFM—and your soundtrack shouldn’t be either.
We aspire to lift you higher. So press play and go PRAIZY™.

channels.name: Word Christian Broadcasting (WCB Radio) WDCY, WDPC, WNEA
channels.description:
The overall purpose of this ministry is to carry out the Great Commission found in Matthew 28:19-20, through radio broadcasting of the Gospel of Jesus Christ. The word “broadcast” is an agricultural term that means to scatter seed indiscriminately over a wide area. It is our joy and privilege to make the Gospel available to anyone and everyone who chooses to listen.

We seek the salvation of souls, the baptism of believers, and the growth and nurturing of Christians. We understand that in America most listeners are already Christians. Therefore, we focus on motivating our listeners to actively pursue the lost, and to live out their faith on a daily basis, through KJV Bible preaching and teaching, and Old Time Gospel Music.

With a year around average of twelve hours of broadcasting per day, we further seek to provide interesting, informative, and entertaining programming that will offer Christians an alternative to secular and worldly entertainment. As a communication vehicle, we seek to promote better fellowship between believers who are “like minded in the faith”. Lastly, we seek to praise the name of our Lord Jesus Christ, and intercede in prayer for our listeners, our nation, and other ministries who are striving to reach the world for Christ.
channels.logo: https://www.eternityready.com/radio/img/Word Christian Broadcasting (WCB Radio) WDCY, WDPC, WNEA.png

channels.name: JOY99
channels.description: For 35+ years, JOY99 has been West Michigan’s source for Contemporary Christian music.  It started with a vision to provide a more Contemporary Christian music station with little to no teaching programs.  It was also decided at that time that JOY99 would be a local for-profit commercial supported station.  We wanted to be funded by the local businesses, not our listeners, for operating expenses allowing listeners to support non-profit organizations.  We have never tallied it up, but a conservative estimate would say that JOY99 listeners have given more than 3 million dollars to nonprofits over that time through on-air fundraising campaigns.  Thank you for being a giving community!

Brightfire Radio is driven by young, vibrant voices with a mission to be heard. We are unfiltered and unafraid, speaking truths that others might shy away from. In a world often marked by polite silence, we’re here to say it as it is – no matter how raw, challenging, or unconventional.

?? A Station for Every Listener ??
Whether you’re a Gen Z listener craving fresh sounds or a seasoned listener looking to reconnect with defining tracks, Brightfire Radio welcomes you. We believe music is universal, ageless, and our diverse lineup is proof of that. Our station is for those who value authenticity, who want real conversations alongside great music.

?? Real Music, Real Talk ??
Brightfire Radio isn’t just about songs; it’s about creating a soundtrack for a generation that’s unafraid to speak up. Tune in, turn it up, and feel the fire of unfiltered commentary and eclectic music.

?? Brightfire Radio – Not Just Music, It’s the Truth ??

#BrightfireRadio #UnfilteredTruth #AlternativeRock #HipHop #ChristianRadio #RealTalk

     Worship Messiah JESUS is back on the air...and is now ad-FREE!  I pray a blessing and a hedge of protection over all listeners who worship Jesus with this radio broadcast.  I ask Jesus to send His Holy Ghost PRESENCE and grab you and cause you to repent and turn from any wicked ways and forgive you and then heal you and answer your prayers. There's no distance in prayer.  Prayer is the only wireless connection that is free.  lol  This Internet radio broadcast is back on the air.  It will forever remain free.    .....  Worship Messiah Jesus is a free Internet radio broadcast with the goal of magnifying The Lord Jesus Christ's Presence, the Anointed One Who breaks our yokes and strongholds when He lives inside our praises (Psalm 22:3).  This station believes Abba Father God Yahweh's Word became flesh (and blood) by the power of His Holy Spirit and dwelt among us and Jesus Christ is God With Us, and Jesus Christ embodies the Godhead as Adonai (Lord) (Colossians 2:9).  Jesus Christ was God's soul and perfect Divine Will on the Cross because Jesus Christ became our sins, iniquity, and insanities and diseases & infirmities that he suffered in our place, and crucified them and died with them.  Jesus Christ, just like Moses' brazen snake on the stake for the people to be healed from God's punishments by looking up at it (John 3:14-17).  However, Christ Jesus rose from the dead grave on the third day, and our sins and iniquities and insanities & diseases are still dead.  All you have to do is humble yourself and be sorry for your sins and ask God to forgive you and to take them away from you, and ask Jesus to come into your heart and ask Him for forgiveness and the Holy Ghost to help you live for Him, and Father God will do it.  The one and only priority and perfect will of God for you is to believe on Jesus Christ, the One through Whom Father God sent His Word to you.  Contact me at anna@annamaria.live

channels.name: KYKD
channels.description: KYKD is a Christian radio station located at Bethel in far western Alaska. It is part of the I-AM radio network owned by Voice for Christ Ministries, Inc.  As the most powerful FM station on the mainland of western Alaska, it serves Bethel and about a dozen surrounding villages and is repeated over translator stations in Quinhagak, Togiak, Kalskag, and Aniak.  It also serves as the primary source of programming for stations in Scammon Bay, Hooper Bay, Saint Marys, Noorvik and Kiana.   The population of all of these communities is predominantly of the native  Yup'ik and Inupiaq people groups.  The purpose of the station is to bring the Good News of the Gospel of Jesus Christ to the people of rural western Alaska.

channels.name: JoyWorship
channels.description:
Why Joy?
It is our heartfelt desire that the world may know they will never have complete Joy without grasping onto the true Joy Giver.  There is no true Joy without Jesus.  The Bible repeats over and over the command to bring Joy, sing for Joy, shout for Joy, cries of Joy, find Joy, choose Joy, and even to share Joy.  We feel we are called to share exactly that…Joy!


Why Worship?
What greater honor could we have than to Worship to the King of Kings!  In Luke 4, we are commanded to “worship the Lord our God”.  Do we really need a command to worship the amazing God who made the heavens and the earth?  Just breath to breathe is reason enough, not to mention the incredible inheritance we have coming.  It is an absolute honor to have the privilege to come before His presence with singing!  Great practice for the day we are worshipping Him face to face.

channels.name: 89.5 KTSY
channels.description:
KTSY is a good different–the kind of different that makes you feel like someone is doing life with you.
Did you hit the snooze button one too many times this morning? We’ve been there. Do you have a drawer that used to hold useful stuff like pens and sticky notes, but now has junk mail, a broken stapler, and a half eaten bag of gummy worms? Yeah, us too.

Sure, KTSY plays Christian music, but that’s not because we think we are better than other people. It’s because we know what it’s like to live life without encouragement, friendship, or hope. It’s not great!

We desire to show people a way out of loneliness and disappointment. Everybody does that a little bit differently. We make it happen by playing music about Jesus, talking about life, and acting a little crazy. You can do it!

channels.name: The Dove
channels.description:
The Dove is your destination for uplifting, faith-driven rock and contemporary Christian music. As part of Thasis Radio Network, The Dove blends powerful lyrics, energetic rhythms, and messages of hope to inspire and encourage listeners in their daily lives. Whether you're looking for modern Christian rock, contemporary worship anthems, or deep-cut faith-based hits, The Dove delivers a dynamic mix that resonates with believers of all ages.

Unlike traditional Christian radio stations, The Dove is built for those who crave a more contemporary and alternative sound in their worship experience. With live DJs, special programming, and exclusive interviews with Christian artists, The Dove goes beyond just playing music—it creates a community where faith and music collide.

Join us in celebrating God’s message through rock and contemporary hits that uplift the spirit and ignite the soul. The Dove isn’t just a station—it’s a movement of faith, hope, and love through the power of music. Tune in and let your spirit soar with The Dove, where Christian rock meets inspiration!
